# Test Project

This is a sample project used to test the Speckit DB bootstrap functionality. It contains a complete documentation structure with features, specifications, tasks, and dependencies.

## Project Overview

The test project demonstrates various scenarios that the bootstrap command should handle:
- Multiple features with different priorities
- Specifications linked to features
- Tasks with acceptance criteria and dependencies
- AI job metadata for automated processing

## Goals

- Validate parsing of all documentation types
- Test dependency resolution and circular dependency detection
- Verify entity relationship mapping
- Test dry-run and actual execution modes
